### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining drill is not working
- Ensure the mining drill at position x=-15.0 y=-50.0 is properly fueled and placed on a valid resource patch before asserting it is working. Check the drill's fuel status and resource availability to resolve the issue.

### NAMESPACE
No new utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the latest steps.
